index: function(doc){index("default", doc.sample.name); if(doc.sample.description){ index("description", doc.sample.description, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.sample.id){ index("id", doc.sample.id, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.sample.owner.name){ index("owner", doc.sample.owner.name, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.sample.source.name){ index("source", doc.sample.source.name, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.measurement.institution){ index("institution", doc.measurement.institution, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.measurement.technique){ index("technique", doc.measurement.technique, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.measurement.requestor.name){ index("requestor", doc.measurement.requestor.name, {"store": "yes"}); }if(doc.measurement.practitioner.name){ index("practitioner", doc.measurement.practitioner.name, {"store": "yes"}); }}
